text: Does anything exist like a `@test_broken_if(condition, test)` which acts like a `@test_broken` or a `@test` depending on the condition ?

as far as I know this doesn’t exist, but you can hand-code it with this:
```macro test_broken_if(broken, exprs...)
    quote
        if $broken
            $Test.@test_broken $(exprs...)
        else
            $Test.@test $(exprs...)
        end
    end
end```
